attributes.action: Ensure people coming to live in the UK from abroad can write and speak english
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure effective integration into UK society it is essential that people coming to live in the UK can speak the native language and write clearly in English. People unable to speak or write English are more likely to be become excluded from society and will struggle to find decent paid employment. In order to create sustainable communities it is necessary to ensure that everyone within that community is able to communicate with each other.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
